import React,{useState}from'react';import'../css/SignUp.css';import{Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{toast}from'react-toastify';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function SignUp(){const navigate=useNavigate();const[name,setName]=useState("");const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[userName,setUserName]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");//Toast functions

",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/signin",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{color:"blue",cursor:"pointer"},children:"Sign In"})})]})})]})});}
